QuestData.Title: Let's Make A Deal
QuestData.Description: Hey there!$b$bYou seem like a gullib- er... um... "intelligent" type.$b$bI propose a deal.$b$bI need a minion to be my muscle to help me acquire a few special... "ingredients" for a ritual.$b$bIn exchange, I'll give you my former master to do with whatever you demon-slaying types do with demons.$b$bIf you are interested, just sign here. In blood, please.
QuestData.RewardText: At last! A minion of my very own!
